data.name: AlreadyRunning
data.comment: Message a users gets when trying to start a server that has already been started.

data.name: AlreadyStopped
data.comment: Message a user gets when trying to stop a server that has already been stopped.

data.name: BadLogin
data.value: Invalid username/password. If you've forgotten your password click here to reset it.
data.comment: Error message user gets when they enter wrong username and/or password

data.name: BadReply
data.value: Unexpected reply received from remote monitor.
data.comment: Error message when the panel receives an invalid reply from monitor.

data.name: ChangeEmail
data.comment: Text given to user when they update their email address.

data.name: ChangePW
data.comment: Text given to user when they update thier password.

data.name: CmdSaved
data.comment: Prompt returned to use when an update for the commandline was successful.

data.name: DemoDisabled
data.value: This feature is disabled for demo users

data.name: Details
data.comment: Main menu table heading

data.name: Disabled
data.value: This feature has been disabled by the administrator.
data.comment: Error returned when a feature is disabled.

data.name: DisabledTxt
data.comment: The word 'Disabled', show on main menu next to server status if server is disabled.

data.name: EditServer
data.comment: Text for edit server link on manage page (only shows if logged in as an admin)

data.name: EditServerTitle
data.comment: Text for edit server link tooltip on manage page (if logged in as an admin)

data.name: ExtraTool
data.comment: Text for extra tool item on manage page

data.name: ExtraToolTitle
data.value: Other options enabled by your provider
data.comment: Tool tip when you hover over extra tool link on manage page

data.name: FailedloginAcctDisabled
data.comment: Error message user gets when trying to login and their account is disabled.

data.name: FileTool
data.comment: Text for file tool item on manage page

data.name: FileToolTitle
data.value: Manage the files on your server
data.comment: Tool tip when you hover over file tool icon on manage page

data.name: Hash
data.value: The server's executable hash has changed. Not starting server.
data.comment: Error message given when a hash mismatch occurs.

data.name: Hash2
data.value: The server's secondary file hash has changed. Not starting server.
data.comment: Error message given when a secondary file hash mismatch occurs.

data.name: Info
data.comment: Main menu table heading

data.name: Location
data.comment: Main menu table heading

data.name: ManageSDef
data.comment: Tooltip for main menu's server defintion page link

data.name: ManageServer
data.comment: Tooltip for main menu's server manage page link

data.name: ManageUser
data.comment: Tooltip for main menu's user manage page link

data.name: MissingExe
data.value: Can't find the server's executable, please contact support.
data.comment: Error message given when the exe for a server could not be found.

data.name: NoExe
data.value: No executable has been defined for this server....
data.comment: Error message given when no exe has been specified for a server.

data.name: NoPermission
data.value: You don't have permission to do that.
data.comment: Error message user gets when trying to do something they're not allowed to do.

data.name: NoPid
data.value: A PID file was not found for the server.
data.comment: Error message when starting a server and the panel can't find the pid file

data.name: NoResp
data.comment: Text returned on main menu when a game server query returns no status

data.name: NoServers
data.value: You don't seem to have access to any game servers.
data.comment: Message user sees when they login and have no access to any game server.

data.name: Notes
data.comment: Text for notes item on manage page

data.name: NotesTitle
data.comment: Tool tip when you hover over note icon on manage page

data.name: PWDontMatch
data.comment: Text given to user when the password fields don't match when trying to change their password.

data.name: PWInvalid
data.comment: Message given to user when they try tot change their password and fail to enter the correct current password.

data.name: PWTooShort
data.value: New passwords need to be atleast six characters long
data.comment: Message given to users when password change is too short.

data.name: QueryTool
data.comment: Text for query tool item on manage page

data.name: QueryToolTitle
data.value: Check the status of your game server
data.comment: Tool tip when you hover over query tool icon on manage page

data.name: RconTool
data.comment: Text for rcon tool item on manage page

data.name: RconToolTitle
data.comment: Tool tip when you hover over rcon tool icon on manage page

data.name: Remote
data.value: Could not connect to remote monitor.
data.comment: Error message when the panel is unable to connect to remote monitor.

data.name: RemoteError
data.comment: status text of servers in main menu

data.name: RemoteErrorTip
data.value: Unable to connect to remote monitor
data.comment: Status tooltip of main menu

data.name: RemoteOffline
data.value: Remote server is marked as offline.
data.comment: Message given when trying to perform an action on a server that is hosted on a remote that is marked as disabled.

data.name: RemoteTimeout
data.value: Connection timed out waiting for a response from the remote monitor.
data.comment: Error message when the panel doesn't receive a reply for the remote monitor in a timely matter.

data.name: RestartedText
data.comment: Text displayed on manage page when a server is restarted

data.name: Running
data.comment: Status text of servers in main menu

data.comment: Tooltip for image next to server status.

data.name: RunningText
data.comment: Represents the 'running text' used on the server management page

data.name: RunningTip
data.value: Server is running, click to stop
data.comment: Status tooltip of main menu

data.name: ServerDisabled
data.value: The server has been disabled, please contact support.
data.comment: Error message user gets when they try to start a server that's been disabled.

data.name: ServerName
data.comment: Main menu table heading

data.name: StartedText
data.comment: Text displayed on manage page when a server is started

data.name: Status
data.comment: Main menu table heading

data.name: Stopped
data.comment: status text of servers in main menu

data.name: StoppedImgTip
data.value: Server is not running. Click to start the server.
data.comment: Tooltip for image next to server status.

data.name: StoppedText
data.comment: Represents the 'stopped text' used on the server management page.

data.name: StoppedText2
data.comment: Text displayed on manage page when a server is stopped

data.name: StoppedTip
data.value: Server is stopped, click to start
data.comment: Status tooltip of main menu

data.comment: Text shown for ticket header on support page

data.comment: Text shown for URL on support page to submit a new ticket

data.comment: Text shown for URL on support page to view tickets

data.value: You can also create a support ticket in the ticket system.

data.name: TooManyServers
data.value: You don't have permission to run more than XXX server at any given time.
data.comment: Error message user gets when they try to start more than XXX servers they are allowed to run.

data.name: UnexpectedError
data.value: There was an unexpected error. Please contact support.
data.comment: Unexptected/unhandled error message

data.name: UnhandledStartError
data.value: Unable to start the server due to an unhandled error, please contact support.
data.comment: Error message for an unhandled error when starting server.

data.comment: Text for update tool item on manage page

data.comment: Tool tip when you hover over update tool icon on manage page

data.comment: Message given to user when they attempt to start a server that is currently being updated.

data.comment: Status text of updating servers in main menu

data.comment: Tooltip for updating link in main menu

data.name: UpdatingText
data.comment: Represents the "updating text' used on the server management page

data.comment: Main menu table heading

data.name: UnhandledStopError
data.value: Unable to stop the server due to an unhandled error, please contact support.

data.comment: Shown on dropdown menu on main menu

data.comment: Text for open in FTP Client button in file tool

data.comment: Text for path legend in file tool

data.name: Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to perform this action?
data.comment: Text for confirmation boxes

data.name: CreateErr
data.comment: Message shown in file tool if there is an error creating file.

data.name: DecompressErr
data.value: Decompression program not found. Please contact support.

data.name: DelRoot
data.value: You may not delete the top most directory. Contact support for assistance.
data.comment: Error message users get in file tool if they try to delete top most folder.

data.name: Demo
data.value: Some features are disabled for demo accounts.

data.name: ExceedsMaxLen
data.comment: Message in file tool if a file is too large for file tool

data.name: FileExists
data.comment: Message shown in file tool if a file already exists

data.name: FName
data.value: You must enter a name first

data.name: FolderNotFound
data.value: The folder was not found. Please contact support.
data.comment: Missing folder message in file tool.

data.name: ParentFolder
data.comment: Text for '..' folder in file tool.

data.name: ThisFolder
data.comment: Text for '.' folder in file tool.

data.name: UnsupportedExt
data.value: This extension is not allowed. Contact support if you feel it should be allowed.
data.comment: File tool message if a user tries to open an unallowed file type

data.name: LastManUpd
data.comment: Text shown on update page note

data.name: UpdateComplete
data.comment: Text shown on update page when update finishes.

data.name: UpdateStop
data.value: You must stop the server before you can update it!
data.comment: Message shown on update page if server is still running when trying to update.

data.name: UpdatingIs
data.value: The server is updating, this page will automatically refresh periodically
data.comment: Status text shown on update page when server is updating

data.name: UpdatingNoOutput
data.value: Update has been started but no text has been returned yet.
data.comment: Shown when the update is running but no text caputred yet.

data.name: UpdatingOutSession
data.value: An update is in progress. It was started by you in another session, someone else, or automatically. The server should restart when the update is complete and the update history will be displayed here. Please contact support if you need assistance.
data.comment: Text shown in update page if panel is unable to get update text from update process.

data.name: Subject

data.name: TicketBlank
data.value: The subject and message fields cannot be blank!
data.comment: Error shown to users on newticket page when subject and message are blank.

data.value: You cannot send a blank reply. Please enter a message.

data.value: Please do not reply to this email, instead login to your account and add a reply.
data.comment: Shown in the bottom of message reply emails.

data.name: TicketUpdate
data.comment: Text for updated trouble ticket email message.

data.name: ExtraStart
data.value: The server must be running before you may run this extra.
data.comment: Error message shown to a user when they try to run an extra that requires the server to be running.

data.name: ExtraStop
data.value: You must stop the server before you may run this extra.
data.comment: Error message shown to a user when they try to run an extra that requires the server to be stopped first.

data.name: FailedloginMaint
data.value: Panel is currently in maintenance mode. Please try logging in later.
data.comment: Shown to users when trying to login when panel is in maintenance mode.

data.name: Players
data.comment: Text for 'players' in status bar on main menu.

data.comment: Text for 'servers' in status bar on main menu.

data.name: PendingRestartTip
data.value: Server is running, but a restart is pending. Click to start restart.

data.comment: Shown on menu page

data.comment: Text returned to user when a graceful shutdown has been started.

data.comment: Text returned when a server's pending shutdown/restart/update is cancelled by user

data.value: A pending server restart has been started

data.value: A shutdown is pending, click to cancel pending shutdown.

data.name: PendingShutdownTipForce
data.value: A shutdown is pending, click to start an immediate shutdown.

data.name: NewNews
data.value: You have been redirected here because a new news item has been added. You can continue to the main menu after reviewing the new items.
data.comment: Show on news.aspx page when a user is redirect after login due to a new news item.

data.name: ShutdownFirst
data.value: The server is running, it must be stopped first to use this tool
data.comment: Message shown to users when they try to use workshop installer on a running server.

data.comment: Message show to user when mod download fails

data.value: No workshop IDs are defined, nothing to do
data.comment: Message shown on workshop tool if user hasn't added any workshop item ids

data.name: WorkshopTool

data.name: WorkshopToolTitle
data.value: Add and update Steam Workshop Mods to this server
data.comment: Tool tip for workshop mod installer button

data.name: RequiresLicense
data.comment: Message shown when trying to do something that needs a license.

data.name: UpdatingMods
data.value: The server is currently updating mods. It will be started when the update is finished if enabled.
data.comment: Message given to user when they attempt to start a server that is currently updating mods.

data.name: UpdatingWorkshopStatus
data.comment: Status text of updating servers in main menu

data.name: UpdatingWorkshopStatusTip
data.value: The server is updating workshop items. It cannot be started or stopped until the update is finished.
data.comment: Tooltip for updating link in main menu

data.name: UpdatingWorkshopText
data.value: Server is currently updating workshop items!
data.comment: Represents the "updating text' used on the server management page

data.name: TfaNotice
data.value: Secure your account with two factor authentication.
data.comment: Message shown to users on main menu to remind them they can enable TFA.

data.name: Time
data.comment: Date/Time stamp

data.name: WorkshopAdded
data.comment: Shown on workshop mod installer page when a new mod id was successfully added.

data.name: WorkshopBrowse
data.value: Browse Steam workshop mods for this game
data.comment: Shown on workshop mod installer page, URL that takes user to steam workshop content

data.name: WorkshopDisabled
data.value: Workshop is not enabled for this game type, cannot continue!
data.comment: Show on workshop mod installer page for an unconfigured gametype.

data.name: WorkshopExists
data.comment: Shown on workshop mod installer page, message shown when adding a mod and it already exists.

data.name: WorkshopGO
data.comment: Message shown to users when workshop mod update was submitted to queue system.

data.name: WorkshopIDErrorNumeric
data.value: Unable to add new item, workshop items should be numeric only.
data.comment: Shown when user enters a non-numeric ID

data.name: WorkshopMissingAPPID
data.value: A Steam App ID is not defined for this game type, cannot continue!
data.comment: Show on workshop mod installer page for an unconfigured gametype.

data.name: WorkshopQueued
data.value: Skipping mod, a job is already scheduled for this item.
data.comment: Message shown when a workshop item is already queued

data.name: Return
data.comment: Text for various buttons that return to you last servers you were managing.

data.name: Extras
data.value: An extra is currently running for the server and cannot be started at this time.

data.name: ExtraStatusTip
data.value: An extra is currently running for the server that requires it to be stopped.

data.name: FileBlocked
data.value: File is not allowed or archive contiains a file that is not allowed.
data.comment: Message shown when a user tries to upload/rename a file that is blocked. (Or archives being decompressed contain an unallowed file)

data.name: WorkShop
data.value: The server is currently installing mods. It will be restarted when complete if enabled.
